Package com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.functions.stops

Contains the Mapbox Maps Android Style Function Stop implementation API classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategoricalStops<I,O>
    Stops implementation for categorical functions
    ExponentialStops<I,O>
    The Stops implementation for exponential functions
    IdentityStops<T>
    The Stops implementation for identity functions
    IntervalStops<I,O>
    The Stops implementation for interval functions
    IterableStops<I,O,S>
    Base class for Stops implementations with a collection of stops
    Stop<I,O>
    A stop represents a certain point in the range of this function
    Stop.CompositeValue<Z extends Number,V>
    Represents a composite input value for composite functions (eg zoom and feature property value)
    Stops<I,O>
    The base class for different stops implementations

Package com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.functions.stops Description

Contains the Mapbox Maps Android Style Function Stop implementation API classes.
See Also:
The style specification
